result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael S. Morse

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: w/Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief

Clerk Kimberly.
Case Called: 11:15am
INCLUDES 15CF629, 15CF810, and 15TR3464 (tracking)
State appears by ADA Sid Brubacher.  Deft appears in person with Atty Richard Lawson
Date and time set for preliminary & plea hearing in 15CF629 & plea in 15CF810

15CF629:
Waiver of  Prelim filed.  
COURT ques. Deft re: Waiver.   
COURT finds Waiver freely & vol. made, finds probable cause & binds deft over for Trial.  
Information to be filed by end of day.
PLEA: GUILTY to Ct. 1

Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed.  VRCW
State moves to:
15CF629:
Ct. 2 Operating while revoked (rev due to alc/contr susbst/refusal) >> D&RI
15CF810:
Ct. 1 Bail Jumping-Felony >> D&RI
Ct. 2 Operating while revoked (rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal) >> D&RI

PLEA: 
15CF629:
Ct. 1 OWI (5th or 6th) >> GUILTY
15TR3464: 
Ct. 1 Refuse to take test for intoxication after arrest >> deemed lawful

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty. 
COURT ORDERS: w/hold sentencing. 3 years probation. 
CONDITIONS: Pay $2452 fine, inclusive. Pay DNA sample and surcharge. Serve 9 months MCJ, huber for work/school/treatment if eligible by jail criteria. Deft has 45 days to report to jail. 36 month driver license revocation, admistrative credit given for any time already served. 36 months IID to be installed immediately, time will not begin until obtain's valid license. Complete AODA assessment with follow through, deft has already complete assessment. Absolute sobriety from drugs and alcohol. 1 day credit given. $1000 cash bond can be applied to court costs

Adj: 11:33am
Shall not drive a motor vehicle without valid driver's license.
